rakuten_query_parameters.keyword: string --> This is the only required parameter
rakuten_query_parameters.hits: integer (the number of items you want to see in the result)
rakuten_query_parameters.condition: integer --> 1 for new OR 0 for used
rakuten_query_parameters.imageFlag: integer --> 1 for only products with images OR 0 for all products
rakuten_query_parameters.shipOverseasFlag: integer --> 1 for only products that can be shipped overseas OR 0 for all products

yahoo_query_parameters.query: string --> This is the only required parameter
yahoo_query_parameters.start: integer (use it for pagination. start + results)
yahoo_query_parameters.shipping: integer --> 1 for no setting OR 2 for free shipping OR 3 for conditional free shipping
yahoo_query_parameters.condition: integer --> 1 for new OR 0 for used
yahoo_query_parameters.delivery_area: string --> a 2-digit string (01 ~ 47) with a leading 0 (i.e. 01: Hokkaido, 05: Akita, 13: Tokyo)
yahoo_query_parameters.delivery_day: integer --> 0 for today OR 1 for tomorrow OR 2 for day after tomorrow
